name: Apex City Prototype
description:
(game is currently win64 only)

It's a small city builder built with raylib.

You can even add your own tiles by making a new folder in base/tiles and adding a 80x80 tile.png to it.

Controls: left-click to place, right-click to remove, scroll wheel to change the selected tile

All assets are placeholders made quickly in Aseprite.
